short_summary: Centralized printing and scanning services and Multifunction Printer (MFP) devices
description: To seek information about centralized printing and scanning services and the procurement of a fleet of Multifunction Printer (MFP) devices for the Senate of Canada. The contractor will provide the IT Department of the Senate with information about their experience in providing centralized printing and scanning services and advice on the purchase of a fleet of new Multifunction Printer (MFP) devices. This does not constitute a formal contract, unsolicited proposals or offers will not be considered.
full_summary:
# Expression of Interest for Centralized Printing and Scanning Services
## Procurement Reference Number: SEN-059-2324
### Overview
The Senate of Canada is seeking expressions of interest from suppliers who can provide centralized printing and scanning services, as well as a fleet of multifunction printer (MFP) devices.

## Request for Information (RFI)

This RFI is intended to gather information and planning purposes only. It does not constitute a solicitation or obligation on the part of the Senate of Canada. The information gathered in response to this RFI will be used to inform the development of a future solicitation.

## Requirements

The following services are required:

* Centralized printing and scanning services
* Procurement of a fleet of MFP devices

## Procurement Details

* Category: SRV (Services)
* Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Bidding groups: None specified
* Service delivery location: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Evaluating criteria: None specified
* Evaluation method: Best value approach

## Important Notes

* This RFI is not a solicitation and will not result in a procurement.
* Unsolicited proposals will not be considered.
* Respondents are not entitled to reimbursement for costs associated with responding to this RFI.
* Any information submitted in response to this RFI becomes the property of the Senate of Canada and will not be returned.

## Request for Information Documents

Please refer to the following documents for more information on this RFI:

* [Centralized Printing and Scanning Services](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25881/finproc_sen-059-2324_printing-solution_final_e_c.pdf)
* [Addendum 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25881/addendum-1_e_sen-059-2324-printing-solution-_final.pdf)

## Contact Information
If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact:

* Shirley Chartrand, Procurement
* Email: [Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca](mailto:Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613 995-8888
